content: this pattern is a basic single and double_crochet creation the pattern includes only the basic instructions to complete although it only requires two relatively simple stitches you will need to know how to switch colors create trim and tie off this pattern will fit a men s small/medium snugly and stops around a high natural waist line essentially you will need to keep your pattern an even number of stitches to achieve the v neck collar your waistband width will determine how wide your garment will be the cat pattern can repeated as many times across as needed to create this effect no matter the size of the vest you will need to buy more yarn if you increase the size of this vest edit this is a sweater vest pattern i created to fit the kitty pattern the source of the kitty pattern i used is linked in my png document hope this helps with any questions you may have - if you like this pattern please consider donating to my ko-fi to support me in creating more **yarn** 1x the women s institute soft and smooth tweed 400g aran any color 600m length 5x the women s institute premium acrylic yarn 100g dk at least 5 colors 250m length
